info.name: Local Thumbnailer Integration
info.summary: API and Preview Provider for externally generated thumbnails
info.description: Allows uploading thumbnails from a local machine via API and using them as native Nextcloud previews. Part of the LocalNCThumbnailer suite. More info: https://github.com/hersche/nc-local-thumbnailer/ and https://github.com/hersche/local-nc-local-thumbnailer/
info.author: Gemini
